attributes.action: We are leaving the EU and request a referendum to vote for the deal or no deal
attributes.additional_details: We do not need to ask again whether to leave or not as this would be undemocratic to do so. The elected members must be guided as the feeling of the country should accept this deal or not to execute the will of the British people of this country.
attributes.background: We the British People have decided to leave the European Union, but the Government is deadlocked for the deal or no deal and need the people to advise the Government on whether to accept The Deal or a No-Deal, Exiting has been decided in 2016 and does not need to be asked again
